Kobalt celebrated wins by numerous clients at the Grammy Awards held in Los Angeles on Feb 12. Awards included (partial listing): Bon Iver - Best New Artist and Best Alternative Music Album; Skrillex for Best Dance Recording & Best Dance/Electronica Album (among other awards); Trey Parker and Matt Stone won for The Book of Mormon for Best Musical Theater Album; and Kid Cudi co-wrote the Grammy-winning Best Rap Song "All Of The Lights."
